name: Robot Control
description:
A small game that was initially an univesity project using a button-grid, upgraded to a better looking unity game.

Your goal is to help a robot reach the exit. It has a mind of its own, and turns whenever it hits an obstacle or a wall. To help it navigate, you can place obstacles that block its path.

Left-click anywhere on the board to create cubes. You can have 3 cubes placed at once. These cubes disappear after 5 seconds, or if the robot hits them twice.
